PacBioAutomationConstraints.Description: Document the automations and part numbers recognized by the system along with their incompatibilities with one another, if applicable.

pbbase:Item.pbbase:Description: An automation defining workflow for a process
A kit which contains reagent supplies to bind prepared DNA template libraries to the DNA polymerase in preparation for sequencing on the instrument
A kit which contains reagent supplies to perform SMRTbell library preparations of primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries
A kit which contains a sequencing reagent plate with chemistry for single molecule real-time sequencing
A kit which contains one or more SMRT®Cells
OS Enzyme for use with the Sequencing reagent kit
SMRT® Cell Oil packaged in a tube

pbpn:Automation.Name: Workflow_ReuseWash
pbpn:Automation.Description: Cell wash for reuse automation workflow

pbpn:Automation.Name: Workflow_Magbead_NoTrypsin
pbpn:Automation.Description: Magbead loading automation workflow without Trypsin

pbpn:Automation.Name: Workflow_Diffusion_NoTrypsin
pbpn:Automation.Description: Diffusion loading automation workflow without Trypsin

pbpn:Automation.Name: Workflow_Magbead_BD
pbpn:Automation.Description: Biotin Depletion Magbead loading automation workflow

pbpn:BindingKit.Name: Sequel™ Binding Kit 1.0
pbpn:BindingKit.Description: The Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 contains reagent supplies to bind prepared DNA template libraries to the Sequel Polymerase 1.0 in preparation for sequencing on the Sequel System. The result is a DNA polymerase/template complex. Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 should be used only with Sequel Sequencing Kit 1.0. Reagent quantities support 24 binding reactions.

pbpn:BindingKit.Name: Sequel™ Binding Kit 1.1
pbpn:BindingKit.Description: The Sequel Binding Kit 1.1 contains reagent supplies to bind prepared DNA template libraries to the Sequel Polymerase 1.0 in preparation for sequencing on the Sequel System. The result is a DNA polymerase/template complex. Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 should be used only with Sequel Sequencing Kit 1.0. Reagent quantities support 24 binding reactions.

pbpn:BindingKit.Name: Sequel™ Binding Kit 1.1
pbpn:BindingKit.Description: The Sequel Binding Kit 1.1 contains reagent supplies to bind prepared DNA template libraries to the Sequel Polymerase 1.0 in preparation for sequencing on the Sequel System. The result is a DNA polymerase/template complex. Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 should be used only with Sequel Sequencing Kit 1.0. Reagent quantities support 24 binding reactions.

pbpn:BindingKit.Name: Sequel™ Binding Kit 2.0
pbpn:BindingKit.Description: The Sequel Binding Kit 2.0 contains reagent supplies to bind prepared DNA template libraries to the Sequel Polymerase 1.0 in preparation for sequencing on the Sequel System. The result is a DNA polymerase/template complex. Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 should be used only with Sequel Sequencing Kit 1.0. Reagent quantities support 24 binding reactions.

pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Name: SMRTbell™ Template Prep Kit
pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Description: The SMRTbell™ Template Prep Kit contains reagent supplies to perform SMRTbell library preparations of primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries for insert sizes ranging from 500 bp to over 20 kb.

pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Name: SMRTbell™ Bulk Temp Prep Kit 1.0 (100 rxn)
pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Description: SMRTbell™ Bulk Temp Prep Kit 1.0 (100 rxn) contains reagent supplies to perform SMRTbell library preparations of primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries for insert sizes ranging from 500 bp to over 20 kb.

pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Name: SMRTbell™ HT Template Prep Kit
pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Description: The SMRTbell HT Template Prep Kit contains reagent supplies to perform 96 automated SMRTbell non-size-selected library preparations of primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries for insert sizes ranging from 500 bp to over 20 kb. Reagents come in 4 x 24 reaction sets.

pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Name: SMRTbell™ Barcoded Adapter Prep-96
pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Description: The SMRTbell Barcoded Adapter Complete Prep Kit- 96 contains both SMRTbell Barcoded Adapter Prep Kit and Barcoded Adapter Plate - 96. Reagent quantities support 96 complete Barcoded Adapter End Repair and Ligation reactions. Use with SMRTbell Damage Repair Kit to complete template preparation and yield primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries.

pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Name: SMRTbell™ Asym Template Prep 1.0
pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Description: The SMRTbell™ Template Prep Kit contains reagent supplies to perform SMRTbell library preparations of primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries for insert sizes ranging from 500 bp to over 20 kb.

pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Name: SMRTbell™ Template Prep Kit 2.0
pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Description: The SMRTbell™ Template Prep Kit contains reagent supplies to perform 96 automated SMRTbell non-size-selected library preparations of primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries for insert sizes ranging from 500 bp to over 20 kb. Reagents come in 4 x 24 reaction sets.

pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Name: SMRTbell™ HT Template Prep Kit 2.0 (96 rxn)
pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Description: The SMRTbell™ HT Template Prep Kit contains reagent supplies to perform 96 automated SMRTbell non-size-selected library preparations of primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries for insert sizes ranging from 500 bp to over 20 kb. Reagents come in 4 x 24 reaction sets.

pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Name: SMRTbell™ Barcoded Complete Prep Kit-96 2.0
pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Description: The SMRTbell™ Barcoded Adapter Complete Prep Kit - 96 contains both SMRTbell Barcoded Adapter Prep Kit and Barcoded Adapter Plate - 96. Reagent quantities support 96 complete Barcoded Adapter End Repair and Ligation reactions. Use with SMRTbell Damage Repair Kit to complete template preparation and yield primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries.

pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Name: SMRTbell™ Asymmetric Auxiliary TPK
pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Description: The SMRTbell™ Asymmetric Auxiliary TPK contains both SMRTbell Barcoded Adapter Prep Kit and Barcoded Adapter Plate - 96. Reagent quantities support 96 complete Barcoded Adapter End Repair and Ligation reactions. Use with SMRTbell Damage Repair Kit to complete template preparation and yield primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries.

pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Name: SMRTbell™ Bulk Asym Auxiliary TPK
pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Description: The SMRTbell™ Bulk Asym Auxiliary TPK contains both SMRTbell Barcoded Adapter Prep Kit and Barcoded Adapter Plate - 96. Reagent quantities support 96 complete Barcoded Adapter End Repair and Ligation reactions. Use with SMRTbell Damage Repair Kit to complete template preparation and yield primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries.

pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Name: SMRTbell™ Barcoded Adapter Prep-96
pbpn:TemplatePrepKit.Description: The SMRTbell™ Barcoded Adapter Prep-96 contains both SMRTbell Barcoded Adapter Prep Kit and Barcoded Adapter Plate - 96. Reagent quantities support 96 complete Barcoded Adapter End Repair and Ligation reactions. Use with SMRTbell Damage Repair Kit to complete template preparation and yield primer-annealed SMRTbell libraries.

pbpn:SequencingKit.Name: Sequel™ Sequencing Plate 1.0
pbpn:SequencingKit.Description: The DNA Sequencing Kit contains a sequencing reagent plate with chemistry for single molecule real-time sequencing on the PacBio RS. Reagent quantities support 8 sequencing reactions to be used in conjunction with SMRT® Cell 4Pac(s). (8 Cells max/Each Row supplies reagents for 1 Sequel SMRT Cell)

pbpn:SequencingKit.Name: Sequel™ Sequencing Plate 1.1
pbpn:SequencingKit.Description: The DNA Sequencing Kit contains a sequencing reagent plate with chemistry for single molecule real-time sequencing on the PacBio RS. Reagent quantities support 8 sequencing reactions to be used in conjunction with SMRT® Cell 4Pac(s). (8 Cells max/Each Row supplies reagents for 1 Sequel SMRT Cell)

pbpn:SequencingKit.Name: Sequel™ Sequencing Plate 1.1
pbpn:SequencingKit.Description: The DNA Sequencing Kit contains a sequencing reagent plate with chemistry for single molecule real-time sequencing on the PacBio RS. Reagent quantities support 8 sequencing reactions to be used in conjunction with SMRT® Cell 4Pac(s). (8 Cells max/Each Row supplies reagents for 1 Sequel SMRT Cell)

pbpn:SequencingKit.Name: Sequel™ Sequencing Plate 1.2
pbpn:SequencingKit.Description: The DNA Sequencing Kit contains a sequencing reagent plate with chemistry for single molecule real-time sequencing on the PacBio RS. Reagent quantities support 8 sequencing reactions to be used in conjunction with SMRT® Cell 4Pac(s). (8 Cells max/Each Row supplies reagents for 1 Sequel SMRT Cell)

pbpn:SequencingKit.Name: Sequel™ Sequencing Plate 1.3
pbpn:SequencingKit.Description: The DNA Sequencing Kit contains a sequencing reagent plate with chemistry for single molecule real-time sequencing on the PacBio RS. Reagent quantities support 8 sequencing reactions to be used in conjunction with SMRT® Cell 4Pac(s). (8 Cells max/Each Row supplies reagents for 1 Sequel SMRT Cell)

pbpn:SequencingKit.Name: Sequel™ Sequencing Verification Plate
pbpn:SequencingKit.Description: The DNA Sequencing Verification Kit contains a sequencing reagent plate with chemistry for single molecule real-time sequencing on the PacBio RS. Reagent quantities support 8 sequencing reactions to be used in conjunction with SMRT® Cell 4Pac(s). (8 Cells max/Each Row supplies reagents for 1 Sequel SMRT Cell)

pbpn:SequencingKit.Name: Sequel™ Sequencing Plate 2.0
pbpn:SequencingKit.Description: The DNA Sequencing Kit contains a sequencing reagent plate with chemistry for single molecule real-time sequencing on the PacBio RS. Reagent quantities support 8 sequencing reactions to be used in conjunction with SMRT® Cell 4Pac(s). (8 Cells max/Each Row supplies reagents for 1 Sequel SMRT Cell)

pbpn:SequencingKit.Name: Sequel™ Sequencing Plate 2.0, (4Rxn)
pbpn:SequencingKit.Description: The DNA Sequencing Kit contains a sequencing reagent plate with chemistry for single molecule real-time sequencing on the PacBio RS. Reagent quantities support 4 sequencing reactions to be used in conjunction with SMRT® Cell 4Pac(s). (4 Cells max/Each Row supplies reagents for 1 Sequel SMRT Cell)

pbpn:ControlKit.Name: Sequel™ DNA Internal Control 1.0
pbpn:ControlKit.Description: The Sequel DNA Internal Control 2.0 contains a fixed template of 2 kb length bound to Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 for use as an internal sequencing control. Reagent quantities provide spike-in controls for a minimum of 24 samples.

pbpn:ControlKit.Name: Sequel™ SMRT®Cell Control Complex 1.0
pbpn:ControlKit.Description: The Sequel SMRT Cell Control Complex 1.0 contains Lambda library DNA template sheared to a peak size of 2 kb and bound to Sequel Binding Kit 1.0. It acts as a complete Sequel SMRT Cell control.

pbpn:ControlKit.Name: Sequel™ DNA Internal Control 2.0
pbpn:ControlKit.Description: The Sequel DNA Internal Control 2.0 contains a fixed template of 2 kb length bound to Sequel Binding Kit 1.0 for use as an internal sequencing control. Reagent quantities provide spike-in controls for a minimum of 24 samples.

pbpn:CellPackKit.Name: SMRT®Cell 1M (4/Pack)
pbpn:CellPackKit.Description: The Sequel SMRT Cell 1M (4/Pack) are nanofabricated consumables each patterned with 1,000,000 wells called zero-mode waveguides (ZMWs). They are packaged together in a streamlined 4 SMRT Cell format (4/tray). One SMRT Cell is utilized in each sequencing reaction, and experiments can be run in single or in batch mode, giving your projects a greater level of flexibility.

pbpn:CellPackKit.Name: SMRT®Cell 1M, Partial External
pbpn:CellPackKit.Description: Individual partial Pack containing 1 - 3 SMRT®Cells each containing 1 million ZMWs

pbpn:CellPackKit.Name: SMRT®Cell 1M, Full Internal
pbpn:CellPackKit.Description: Individual 4 Pack containing 4 SMRT®Cells each containing 1 million ZMWs

pbpn:CellPackKit.Name: SMRT®Cell 1M, Partial Internal
pbpn:CellPackKit.Description: Individual 4 Pack containing 4 SMRT®Cells each containing 1 million ZMWs

pbpn:CellPackKit.Name: SMRT®Cell 1M (4/Pack)
pbpn:CellPackKit.Description: The Sequel SMRT Cell 1M (4/Pack) are nanofabricated consumables each patterned with 1,000,000 wells called zero-mode waveguides (ZMWs). They are packaged together in a streamlined 4 SMRT Cell format (4/tray). One SMRT Cell is utilized in each sequencing reaction, and experiments can be run in single or in batch mode, giving your projects a greater level of flexibility.

pbpn:CellPackKit.Name: SMRT®Cell 1M, Partial External
pbpn:CellPackKit.Description: Individual partial Pack containing 1 - 3 SMRT®Cells each containing 1 million ZMWs

pbpn:CellPackKit.Name: SMRT®Cell 1M, Full Internal
pbpn:CellPackKit.Description: Individual 4 Pack containing 4 SMRT®Cells each containing 1 million ZMWs

pbpn:CellPackKit.Name: SMRT®Cell 1M, Partial Internal
pbpn:CellPackKit.Description: Individual 4 Pack containing 4 SMRT®Cells each containing 1 million ZMWs

pbpn:OtherKit.Name: Sequel™ OS Enzyme
pbpn:OtherKit.Description: OS Enzyme is currently packaged with the Sequel Sequencing Kit 1.0.

pbpn:OtherKit.Name: Sequel™ SMRT®Cell Oil
pbpn:OtherKit.Description: SMRT®Cell Oil packaged in 2 mL tubes.

pbpn:OtherKit.Name: Verification Sequel™ OS Enzyme
pbpn:OtherKit.Description: Verification OS Enzyme is currently packaged with the Sequel Sequencing Kit 1.0.

pbpn:OtherKit.Name: Verification Sequel™ SMRT®Cell Oil
pbpn:OtherKit.Description: Verification SMRT®Cell Oil packaged in 2 mL tubes.
